title: Remove boost from BCH/EMBER and give it to LAWUSD/EMBER
content:
Remove boost from BCH/EMBER farm.

  

 Economic impact

With the upcoming farming scheme(21st) we are going to lose the lawUSD/EMBER farm while increasing the allocation to BCH/EMBER. By removing the boost from BCH and reallocating it to lawUSD we can keep the lawUSD/EMBER farm.

  

Impact on users

The boost will go to the lawUSD/EMBER farm.
options: Yes - remove from BCH add to lawUSD
